user_query: Is there a way to search for an entity on the OFAC Sanctions List without knowing their unique ID? I would like to perform a fuzzy search based on the entity's name and retrieve their first name, last name, and any alternative names associated with them.

TaskList.description: Perform a fuzzy search for the entity's name on the OFAC Sanctions List.
Retrieve details including first name, last name, and alternative names associated with the fuzzy search results.
